message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[31-May-2025 05:49:31 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_assistente_athlos (id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, url text DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
